author: asianlego
title: Nice to place on my schoolbag
review:
As per my rating, I could have given it a 5 but I gave it only 4 because when I bought it, I noticed it was different than the previous Harry Potter keychain - it had no cape! But to compensate this they chucked in two white plates with a Lego logo and a Harry Potter typeface. This minifig is of the more 'grown-up' Harry Potter.

Also, I didn't understand why here it said the RRP was £2.99.. I bought it in Legoland Windsor and the price tag was £3.50!
